institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Continuing employment incentive payment and operating rules/Article 4 (Establishment and guidance of plan)
contents: Article 4 (Establishment and guidance of plan) ① The chairman of the board of directors must establish an incentive payment plan that includes incentives application targets, application procedures, support amount, promotion schedule, and required budget by March 31st of each year., ② The chairman of the board of directors shall establish a plan to pay incentives. Applicants must be provided with application guidance for the incentive, including payment requirements, application period, application documents, and application method, by June 30th of each year.
